nodes.text: Foless Spaceport Authority was an organization on the planet Foless. In 21 BBY, two of its officers investigated the arrival of the Jedi Nuru Kungurama, who had unknowingly traveled in the company of a slaver. Kungurama and his ally Gizz stole the officers' swoops to chase after Kuvuta Pindi. During that year, Spaceport Authority officers wore blue uniforms with a silver helmet and tinted goggles, along with silver gloves and boots and belt.
Foless Spaceport Authority appears in 2011's The Clone Wars: Strange Allies, a comic tie-in to the Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Secret Missions series.
